title: getting a timer for dodging a game where your role gets stolen even when you called it first
body:
even in ranked this happens and riot doesnt give two fucks. idk why im being punished for avoiding a game with a troll.

either make the first dodge free or give us the ability to report people in champ select. this is the end of s6 and nothing has been done.

replies.body: Well did you get your role through the dynamic que? Or do you think that you can call your role through the chat means that you get it?
u dont know how normals work. also ive had my roles stolen by people assigned support in ranked before. its nothing new.
I think you mean blinds. Riot don't really care about role selection in blinds, and honestly I don't think they should.
The days of choosing your role in chat are gone. You go by what you're assigned in ranked.
normal games. also some people can be assigend support and still take mid or whatever they want. stop denying it.

Your role is the one that the game assigned to you, what you "call" doesn't matter in the slightest.

You can choose to trade roles with another player, but only if both agree.
you can report them. Play their role than report them after game :) screen shot and send to riot support?

the worst thing is that this could EASILY be solved by implementing a system that scans for what they picked, cross references things said in the chat, and bans people who are reported for stealing someone's role

they just don't care

they could also make certain champions not selectable for certain roles, but the .01% of players who choose stupid shit in ranked would bitch and FOR SOME REASON RIOT CARES ABOUT THEM

but not the 99.9% of players who make up their entire revenue system who are sick of these fucking idiots who do this shit.
